# Zohran Mamdani Route Tracker - Mobile GIS Web App

## Project Overview
Mobile-first GIS web application for tracking a predetermined walking route with live location tracking and interactive stops. Designed with NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's campaign theme.

## Key Features
- Predetermined route display with start, end, and waypoints
- Live GPS tracking of current position
- Interactive stops with descriptions and plans
- Next stop status indicator
- Mobile-optimized interface
- NYC/Zohran Mamdani themed design

## Technical Stack
- Vanilla HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript
- Google Maps JavaScript API
- Geolocation API
- Progressive Web App capabilities
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Design Guidelines
- Colors: NYC municipal colors, progressive theme
- Typography: Clean, accessible fonts
- UI: Touch-friendly, mobile-optimized
- Branding: Zohran Mamdani campaign aesthetic
